attributes.action: Motor Bike/Moped Riders should take a full Motor bike test.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Due to the increasing number of motor bikes on the roads and the increase in accidents it should be made law that all motor bike/Mopeds riders be made to take the full motor bike test at different CC,s i.e. up to 175cc, then up to 500 then up to 1000cc & above, with a part that if you cannot pick the bike up from the floor then this would be a fail point.(The CBT Test in not sufficient for busy roads) This would lend itself for riders use the roads safley both for themselves & other road users. 
"Quite rightly" the current motor bike test is a harder test to pass than the motor car test.
One of the Macarbe up sides to this is the numurous Organ Donors the downside is obviuos to all concerned.
